I am a junior at Northwestern University majoring in Computer Engineering in the McCormick School of Engineering and Applied Science. My interests are primarily in Computer Architecture, Parallel Computing, Artificial Intelligence, and Embedded Systems. I am a member of Northwestern Formula Racingâ€™s Electronics sub-team, where I have worked on projects ranging from displaying telemetry data to control signals and power distribution. This Fall, I am also serving as a Peer Mentor (Undergraduate TA) for EECS 213: Intro to Computer Systems.
